description: Apply vessel detection thresholding on Ellipsoid Corrected SENTINEL1_GRD data. The process will export the thresholding results to a GeoJson FeatureCollection.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The raster cube to apply the thresholding to. The raster cube must belong to the SENTINEL1_GRD collection.

returns.description: Returns `false` if the process failed to complete the thresholding, or the output could not be exported  GeoJson FeatureCollection.

links.title: Data Cubes explained in the openEO documentation
